page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: As a teenager who has left school there are a few options open.Many find jobs in Tenterden and the surrounding villages or Ashford our nearest town.Others go on to Further or Higher Education at Colleges,Polytechnics or University.Job opportunities are relatiuely good in this area. Facilities enjoyed at Homewood school are missed by school leavers.Evening classes at the school run for a limited period only,and regular visits to the sports centre at Ashford can become costly.To maintain an interest in hockey, I joined Ashford Hockey Club, but for many teenagers, transport is a problem. Social activities in Tenterden are severely limited. There is nowhere for young people to meet for a coffee and a chat once they have outgrown the local youth club. {(continued)
